attributes.action: Start acknowledging that global warming and climate change are real!!
attributes.background: We have just twelve years to tackle climate change before irreversible damage is done, global leaders need to recognise this and take action now!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

The UK Government already recognises climate change and has legal obligations under the Climate Change Act 2008 to tackle it. We aren't sure what further action you would like taken.
